@mainpage
An interface to activate the workspace switcher in Unity 2D.

interface.name: com.canonical.Unity2d.Spread
interface.dox:d: An interface to activate the workspace switcher in Unity 2D.

method.name: ShowAllWorkspaces
method.dox:d: Show the workspace switcher without any workspace zoomed in. Optionally show only the windows of the application with the specified applicationDesktopFile (if not an empty string).

method.name: ShowCurrentWorkspace
method.dox:d: Show the workspace switcher with the current workspace zoomed in. Optionally show only the windows of the application with the specified applicationDesktopFile (if not an empty string).

method.name: FilterByApplication
method.dox:d: Activate filtering so that only the windows of the application with applicationDesktopFile are shown. Pass an empty string to disable filtering.

method.name: Hide
method.dox:d: Hide the workspace switcher without changing the currently active workspace or application.

method.name: IsShown
method.dox:d: Query whether the workspace switcher is visible or not.

arg.name: result
arg.dox:d: True if the workspace switcher is visible.
